statements: SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_title FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE report_date = '2023-01-01';
SELECT report_id, report_title, risk_level FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE risk_level > 3;
SELECT report_title, report_date FROM risk_assessment_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE report_title LIKE '%security%';
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE risk_level > 3 ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT report_id, report_title FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT DISTINCT report_title FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE risk_level < 2;
SELECT report_id, risk_level FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-07-15';
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_reports ORDER BY risk_level ASC, report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessmentReports;
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM RiskAssessmentReports WHERE report_type = 'Safety';
SELECT report_id, report_description FROM RiskAssessmentReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;

SELECT report_id, report_type, COUNT(*) AS attachment_count FROM RiskAssessmentReports LEFT JOIN ReportAttachments ON RiskAssessmentReports.report_id = ReportAttachments.report_id GROUP BY report_id, report_type;
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessmentReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_type, report_description FROM RiskAssessmentReports WHERE report_type = 'Internal';
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessmentReports WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01' AND report_date <= '2021-12-31';

SELECT report_id, report_type, COUNT(*) AS attachment_count FROM RiskAssessmentReports JOIN ReportAttachments ON RiskAssessmentReports.report_id = ReportAttachments.report_id GROUP BY report_id, report_type;

SELECT report_id, report_type, attachment_url FROM RiskAssessmentReports JOIN ReportAttachments ON RiskAssessmentReports.report_id = ReportAttachments.report_id WHERE ReportAttachments.attachment_type = 'PDF';
SELECT R.report_id, R.report_date, A.attachment_url FROM RiskAssessmentReports R LEFT JOIN ReportAttachments A ON R.report_id = A.report_id;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_description FROM risk_assessment_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_description, risk_level FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE risk_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM report_comments ORDER BY comment_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, attachment_name FROM report_attachments WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_reports
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_description FROM risk_assessment_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT report_id, report_description FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE risk_level > 5
SELECT report_id, report_description FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE risk_level = 3 ORDER BY report_id ASC
SELECT r.report_id, r.report_date, c.comment FROM risk_assessment_reports r JOIN report_comments c ON r.report_id = c.report_id
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_title, report_date FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT department_id, department_name FROM department ORDER BY department_id DESC;
SELECT full_name, hire_date, job_title FROM employee WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT log_id, action, action_timestamp, performed_by FROM audit_log WHERE action='INSERT';
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT report_title, report_date FROM risk_assessment_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT full_name, job_title, salary FROM employee WHERE salary > 50000
SELECT department_name, location FROM department ORDER BY department_name
SELECT report_title, action, action_timestamp, performed_by FROM risk_assessment_reports JOIN audit_log ON risk_assessment_reports.report_id = audit_log.report_id
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_reports;
SELECT report_name, assessment_date FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE risk_level='High';
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, comments FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE assessment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE position='Manager';
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE assessment_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT report_name, risk_level FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT employee_name, position, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date < '2020-01-01' ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT dept_name, manager_name FROM departments WHERE location = 'New York' AND manager_name IS NOT NULL;

SELECT r.report_name, f.factor_name, r.comments FROM risk_assessment_reports r INNER JOIN reports_assessment_mapping ram ON r.report_id = ram.report_id INNER JOIN risk_factors f ON ram.assessment_id = f.factor_id WHERE f.factor_name = 'Physical Hazards';
